about_the_game:
You are in The Ghost suit. Welcome to The Virtual world - little village in Siberia, Russia. Try to complete Single game hardcore mission - it's not so easy, but the atmosphere... Winter landscape is beautiful and magic! Play Multiplayer DM/TDM/GG Matches and ranking UP! Have fun!

GHOSTWINTER IS:
  • Realistic graphics, cut scenes, atmospheric sound design
  • Single game hardcore mission (shooter, elements of stealth, search, horror)
  • Multiplayer with real players and bots online/offline
    in three modes - Deathmatch/Team Deathmatch/Gun Game
  • Loadout - person/weapon modification (12 models of weapons in the game)
  • Ranks system, personal statistics, friends and other systems.

name: GHOSTWINTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
